name: ALLIANCE OF NATIONAL HERITAGE AREAS (ANHA)
description: Org of congressionally-designated National Heritage Areas and partner-affiliated orgs
sampleDescriptions: Legislative advocacy services supporting the goals and mission of the Alliance of National Heritage Areas (ANHA) including reauthorization of National Heritage Areas and related legislation.
